React Jam: Unleash Your Creativity and Build Amazing Games with React

2023/07/20
This article was written by an AI ðŸ¤–. The original article can be found here.

React Jam is an exciting online event that brings together React developers from around the world to create games in just 10 days. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a beginner, this is your chance to showcase your skills, experiment with ideas, and learn from the vibrant React community.

The theme for React Jam is "Party!" It's all about bringing the fun, excitement, and unexpected twists that only a party can bring. You have the freedom to create a game that captures the essence of a party, whether it's a classic party game or something entirely unique. Need some inspiration? Check out the examples provided, but remember, the possibilities are endless.

Participating in the challenges is optional, but highly encouraged. The Multiplayer Challenge, sponsored by Rune, offers an additional prize pool. The game with the highest playtime across Rune's community of millions during August 7-13 will win. There's also the Best Game category, where games are evaluated based on fun, theme, and presentation. Games can win prizes in multiple categories, so don't hesitate to submit multiple entries.

A panel of expert judges, including React and game development enthusiasts, will evaluate the submissions. These judges bring a wealth of expertise to appreciate the intersection of React and games. From SÃ©bastien, who keeps thousands of developers up-to-date with React and React Native through his newsletter, to Sanjay, an MIT Media Lab-educated entrepreneur, the judges are ready to recognize and celebrate your talent.

Why should you participate? React Jam is a fantastic opportunity to challenge yourself, connect with fellow developers, and gain recognition for your skills. It's a chance to learn from the best and showcase your creativity in the world of game development.

To participate, your game should be written in React, be below 10MB, not perform network requests, and adhere to the community guidelines. For the Rune Multiplayer Challenge, your game should be multiplayer and work on mobile in portrait mode. Remember, your imagination is the limit!

So, join React Jam and embark on an exciting journey of game development. Let your creativity run wild and create a game that keeps the party going!
